schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

chip_target.name: chip target
chip_target.description: The target of the ChIP-seq experiment e.g. H3K4Me3, H3K4Me1, H3K27Me3, H3K27Ac, CTCF. If your target is not in the list, please contact the faang-dcc helpdesk.

control_experiment.name: control experiment
control_experiment.description: Experiment alias (in this submission) or ENA experiment accession (if submitted previously) of the ChIP-seq input DNA experiment which acts as the control/background for the analysis.

chip_antibody_provider.name: chip antibody provider
chip_antibody_provider.description: The name of the company, laboratory or person that provided the antibody e.g. Diagneode.

chip_antibody_catalog.name: chip antibody catalog
chip_antibody_catalog.description: The catalog from which the antibody was purchased e.g. pAb-003-050.

chip_antibody_lot.name: chip antibody lot
chip_antibody_lot.description: The lot identifier of the antibody e.g. A5051-001P.

library_generation_max_fragment_size_ran.name: library generation max fragment size range
library_generation_max_fragment_size_ran.description: The maximum fragment size range of the preparation.

library_generation_min_fragment_size_ran.name: library generation min fragment size range
library_generation_min_fragment_size_ran.description: The minimum fragment size range of the preparation.
